emailForm.label: Email Address
emailForm.helper: Your email will be used for payment and account creation only. Email cannot be changed after payment (locked for security).

error.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

metadata.title: Payment Error - Capsule Note
metadata.description: There was an issue with your payment. Please try again or contact support.

payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.description: Your payment could not be processed. This could be due to insufficient funds, an expired card, or other payment issues. Please check your payment method and try again.

session_expired.title: Checkout Session Expired
session_expired.description: Your checkout session has expired for security reasons. Sessions are valid for 24 hours. Please start a new checkout to subscribe.

email_mismatch.title: Email Mismatch
email_mismatch.description: The email address in your checkout session doesn't match your account. For security, you must sign in with the same email used for payment.

email_not_verified.title: Email Not Verified
email_not_verified.description: You must verify your email address before your subscription can be activated. Check your inbox for a verification email from Capsule Note.

pending_subscription_not_found.title: Subscription Not Found
pending_subscription_not_found.description: We couldn't find your pending subscription. This might mean it has expired or was already activated. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

unknown.title: Something Went Wrong
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred during checkout. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
